paragraphs: Action star and legendary hero of internet memes Chuck Norris will visit Prague. The American actor will take part in the event "Weekend with a Legend," which will be held on November 22 and 23, 2025 at the House of Fun Prague venue in the Máj shopping center.

In addition to 85-year-old Norris, other celebrity guests will also take part in it. Their names will be announced later. This was reported to journalists on Tuesday, September 9, by Petr Vetrovsky, a representative of the organizing company VDN Promo.

"We conducted a survey to see who to invite to the tenth anniversary of our agency, and Norris won by a huge margin. He is popular thanks to his career and perhaps because of the jokes circulating about him. Fans will be able to purchase not only a photograph but also an autograph on items they bring," he said.
As part of the event, Norris will talk to the audience about his career, answer questions, and also hold a photo and autograph session.
Tickets are already on sale on the Goout website.

The price for a seat in the audience ranges from 990 to 1290 kroner, while for a VIP ticket (including a photo with the star and an autograph) you will have to pay 4990 kroner. Participation in the autograph session alone costs 3990 kroner.
"The Weekend with a Legend" is a continuation of the previous event "Night with a Legend", during which a meeting with Jean-Claude Van Damme took place in Prague.
